name: Unreal Pong (Tony_N)
description:
Unreal Pong is part of my Unreal Arcade collection in which I try to recreate and extend popular arcade games in Unreal Engine for self-learning.

Rules

The first player to reach 11 points wins!

Status Effects
  • 2x - Doubles the point value of the ball
  • >< - Halves the paddle size
  • >> - Increases paddle move speed
  • << - Decreases paddle move speed
Controls

Keyboard & Mouse

  • W/S - Up/Down
  • Esc/P - Pause game
